TopicTitle: Tracking Station Nighttime Lighting Increases Dependent Upon Mission Activity

Articles.Content:
Simply put, the more missions active, the more lights and activity around the tracking station at night. Perhaps the lighting could reflect the different types of missions. For instance, on of the radar telescopes and one of the little buildings could represent space stations, another rovers, another active ships, each lit corresponding to the number of missions of those types active at the time.

Purely aesthetic. Just for fun.
